snippet: In response to an editorial, the American Jewish Committee says “only a doctrinaire reading of the Constitution would treat it as a forbidden subsidy to religion.”
lead_paragraph: In response to an editorial, the American Jewish Committee says “only a doctrinaire reading of the Constitution would treat it as a forbidden subsidy to religion.”

headline.main: Aid After the Storm: Where Is the Church-State Line?
headline.print_headline: Aid After the Storm: Where Is the Church-State Line?
